T.description:
The effect description may be either a plain text or a text that is divided
by a list of effects for each quality level. It may also be a list for each
two quality levels.

text_before.description:
The effect description before the list of effects for each quality
level.

quality_levels.description: The list of effects for each quality level.

text_after.description:
The effect description after the list of effects for each quality
level.

text_before.description:
The effect description before the list of effects for each quality
level.

quality_levels.description: The list of effects for each two quality levels.

text_after.description:
The effect description after the list of effects for each quality
level.

value.description: The casting time value in actions.

during_lovemaking.description:
The casting time during lovemaking. In Aventurian Intimacy, you may only
use an activatable skill during lovemaking if it has a casting time used
during lovemaking.

The casting time during lovemaking. In Aventurian Intimacy, you may only
use an activatable skill during lovemaking if it has a casting time used
during lovemaking.

permanent_value.description: The part of the cost value that has to be spent permanently.

is_minimum.description: If `true`, the non-modifiable value is a minimum value.

permanent_value.description: The part of the cost value that has to be spent permanently.

per.description:
The cost have to be per a specific countable entity, e.g. `8 KP per
person`.

minimum_total.description:
If defined, the minimum total AE that have to be spent casting the
skill.

translations.description:
All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag
(BCP47).

All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag
(BCP47).

note.description: A note, appended to the generated string in parenthesis.

compressed.description:
A compressed note, if applicable. If not specified it should not
be displayed in small location.

translations.description: All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag (BCP47).

description.description: A description of where the cost come from.

default.description: The full description of where the cost come from.

compressed.description:
A compressed description of where the cost come from for use in
small areas (e.g. on character sheet).

Map.description:
A content that is `2/4/8/16 AE for an item the size of a
cup/chest/door/castle gate` may be respresented as the following map:

```yaml
options:
  - value: 2
    label: "cup"
  - value: 4
    label: "chest"
  - value: 8
    label: "door"
  - value: 16
    label: "castle gate"
for_append: "an item the size of a"
```

This will generate the exact same string as seen above – given it is set
for a spellwork and thus `AE` is used.

options.description: The possible costs and associated labels.

translations.description: All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag (BCP47).

list_prepend.description: Place a string between the `for` and the grouped map option labels.

list_append.description: Place a string after the grouped map option labels.

replacement.description:
If the string from the book cannot be generated using the default
generation technique, use this string. All options still need to be
inserted propertly, since it may be used by in-game tools to provide a
selection to players.

value.description: The full cost value for this option.

permanent_value.description: The part of the `value` that has to be paid permanently.

translations.description: All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag (BCP47).

label.description: The description of the option for cost string generation.

label_standalone.description:
The description of the option if used standalone. Only used if
different from `label`.

is_minimum.description: If `true`, the non-modifiable value is a minimum value.

translations.description: All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag (BCP47).

note.description: A note, appended to the generated string in parenthesis.

compressed.description:
A compressed note, if applicable. If not specified it should not
be displayed in small location.

base.description: The base value that is derived from the check result.

modifier.description: If defined, it modifies the base value.

arithmetic.description: The arithmetic how to apply the `value` to the `base`.

value.description: The value that is applied to the `base` using the defined `arithmetic`.

maximum.description: Specified if the duration has a maximum time span.

translations.description: All translations for the entry, identified by IETF language tag (BCP47).

default.description:
The full replacement string. It must contain `$1`, which is
going to be replaced with the generated duration string, so
additional information can be provided without duplicating
concrete numeric values.

compressed.description:
A compressed replacement string for use in small areas (e.g. on
character sheet). It must contain `$1`, which is going to be
replaced with the generated duration string, so additional
information can be provided without duplicating concrete
numeric values.
